'''''Beginner's Luck''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete {{Quest|Diamond in the Rough...}}.

==Trivia==
* References the idiom {{zh|时也，命也，运也，非吾之所能也|rm=shíyě, mìngyě, yùnyě, fēi wǔ zhī suǒnéngyě}}, which means time, life, and luck are not matters one can control.
